message.body: So I went to an interview for a part-time night thing and not only did I get the position, I also gave her my business cards! Interviewer wants a cake. Lmao, only me
That's great! Part time position for what?

I wanted to do delivery nights at weekends for somewhere... applied to uncle oogies and they called me in for an interview. unfortunately they have enough drivers but saw my experience and wanted me as a counter girl to take the orders. Said I had more than enough phone/ customer service experience
Idk if I'm gonna take it tho
Hey.. would you be available to go to dinos for me one day This week? They are 9-5 and I work 830-6 everyday this week
I just need one item only $.50... its a card board insert. Its flat, you put it inside a cake box and it prevents the cupcakes from banging around.
I can take a picture of what it looks like when I get home from work. Its located on the right side of isle 2, second from bottom shelf
They come in different sizes... I need the one with 12 cupcake slots
Just need it by fri so if your around there going to or from edens or moms... thank you!!
